com.yahoo.ads.pb

Class PistachiosClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.ads.pb.PistachiosClient

  • public class PistachiosClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Pistachio Client Class
    • To use the Client, new an instance and call the functions
    • TBA: Thread Safty
    • TBA: Connection Reuse (see setXORMode)

    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • lookup

        public byte[] lookup(byte[] id)
              throws MasterNotFoundException,
                     java.lang.Exception
        To lookup the value of an id. Given the id return the value as a byte array.
        Parameters:
        id - id to look up as byte[].
        Returns:
        byte array return in byte array, null if key not found
        Throws:
        MasterNotFoundException - when fail because no master found
        ConnectionBrokenException - when fail because connection is broken in the middle
        java.lang.Exception - other errors indicating failure

      • store

        public boolean store(byte[] id,
            byte[] value)
              throws MasterNotFoundException,
                     ConnectionBrokenException
        To store the key value without calling callback.
        Parameters:
        id - id to store as byte[].
        value - value to store as byte array
        Returns:
        boolean succeeded or not
        Throws:
        MasterNotFoundException - when fail because no master found
        ConnectionBrokenException - when fail because connection is broken in the middle

      • store

        public boolean store(byte[] id,
            byte[] value,
            boolean callback)
              throws MasterNotFoundException,
                     ConnectionBrokenException
        To store the key value.
        Parameters:
        id - id to store as byte[].
        value - value to store as byte array
        callback - does the registered callback need to be triggered
        Returns:
        boolean succeeded or not
        Throws:
        MasterNotFoundException - when fail because no master found
        ConnectionBrokenException - when fail because connection is broken in the middle

                   java.util.List<byte[]> events)
                     throws MasterNotFoundException,
                            ConnectionBrokenException
        To process a batch of events
        Parameters:
        id - id to store as byte[].
        events - list of events as byte []
        Returns:
        boolean succeeded or not
        Throws:
        MasterNotFoundException - when fail because no master found
        ConnectionBrokenException - when fail because connection is broken in the middle
